title: Ticket #2495: condor_preen EXCEPTs when processing multiple subdirs for local locks
description: The recursion in rec_lock_cleanup incorrectly modified depth when recursing. The result was decreasing depth traversal when cleaning locks. This would eventually result in construction of a FileLock on an invalid path, causing an EXCEPT.
